summary: Implements a ConvNeXt V2 block that applies a depthwise convolution, channel‑wise layer normalization, linear (1×1) projections, GELU activation and optional stochastic depth, operating directly on NHWC tensors for efficient TensorFlow execution.
business_intent: Provides a reusable TensorFlow layer for constructing ConvNeXt V2 architectures, enabling fast and scalable vision model development.
